summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 YAMAHA XVS950. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE RECALL ASSOCIATED WITH NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER: 11V533000 (FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE: DELIVERY) HAD EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE REPAIRS TO BE PERFORMED. THE DEALER STATED THAT THE PART WAS NOT AVAILABLE TO PERFORM THE RECALL AND DID NOT KNOW WHEN THE PART WOULD BECOME AVAILABLE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 2,000.
